alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 18 at 3:35AM HST until November 18 at 12:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND BIG ISLAND UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... .A north swell (360 degrees) is holding steady this morning. This swell is expected to begin falling later today and allow surf to fall to below advisory levels this afternoon. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON HST TODAY... * WHAT...Surf 12 to 16 feet. * WHERE...North-facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Big Island. * WHEN...Until Noon HST today. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
